website_summaries.verdict: Pure product for health enthusiasts. Clean, organic, and humanely produced.
pros: Unflavored product that is soy and GMO-free
Mixes in to any drink or shake with no taste
Made with sunflower lecithin, which helps egg whites dissolve fully in all drinks
cons: Some customers found the smell of eggs to be too strong

customer_reviews.title: Larva growing in it!
customer_reviews.text: I received my egg white powder today and found larva growing in it (see pic)! It was sealed when it arrived and not expired. When I tried to return it or get a refund it says it’s non-returnable. I’m very disappoint with how much I paid for this! Update: A few weeks later the company contacted me & since has given me a full refund!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Bess

customer_reviews.title: Mix it with something
customer_reviews.text: I'm only piping in because none of the reviews warned me that it literally tastes like death. It becomes bearable when mixed, but don't try it alone in water.
customer_reviews.author: VanPatten Roux

customer_reviews.title: Horribly ill and even more horrid gas
customer_reviews.text: This made my husband violently ill, twice since we didn't know this is what caused it. I didn't have that problem but even at 1/4 strength no one would want to be in the same room as me.
customer_reviews.author: LivMoore1975

customer_reviews.title: Convenient way to get more protein in your diet
customer_reviews.text: After a week of experimenting, I have some favourite ways of using this protein powder. It is tasteless, apart from being a bit salty, and most easily mixed with water and fruit (frozen, fresh, freeze dried) in a blender. Added to hot cereal, it becomes tiny bits of cooked egg white, which looks weird but has no flavour. I’ve started mixing in a quarter cup when I bake bread or muffins, and know that I’m increasing the protein content a bit, without changing the texture of the recipe. I can’t eat dairy products, but I suspect that this egg white protein could be used wherever you have been using whey powder.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad....is that even normal?
customer_reviews.text: Ordered once and must’ve liked it because I ordered a 2nd time. Couldn’t finish the 2nd bag. Sickening smell - had to put a lid on my smoothie cup to drink it. Mixes well. Good amount of protein but can’t handle the smell. Switched to Now Sports unflavored egg white protein....not as much protein in theirs but I’ll just use more. No weird smell with Now Sports
customer_reviews.author: Picky Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for smoothie making, not drinking with water.
customer_reviews.text: Flavorless, but not odorless. There is definitely a powdery egg smell to it, which - as someone that likes both whey and paleo protein powders - is pretty disgusting when mixed only with water. It mixes extremely well. It's actually more soluble than any protein powder I've ever used before. This would be ideal for making a smoothie, but not for someone like me that wants something to mix straight with water. It's bearable with 4 oz juice and 4 oz of water, so I'll make it through this bag eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Black

customer_reviews.title: UNABLE TO RETURN AN UNOPEN PACKAGE EVEN WITH AMPLE TIME ACCORDING TO THE PURCHASE DATE.
customer_reviews.text: The price, but it left me hungry - I have tried other protein shakes along with protein bar for breakfast and lunch - but with this product, I even used doubled portion and still left me hungry and horrible gas. Also forget about trying to return it! the manufacturer won't take it back. I ended up with 2 packages and have a brand new delivered a few days ago and CANNOT BE RETURNED! AMAZON SENDS YOU TO THE GENERAL LINK BASICALLY THE RUN AROUND! WITH NO SPECIFICS.
customer_reviews.author: Bodhi Sattva

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: The best protein powder I've ever used. It's super cost effective and there's only two ingredients. There are no artificial sweeteners so no weird aftertaste unlike others I've tried. Add your own flavors and it's perfect for smoothies. I mix mine with coffee, chocolate powder, vanilla and some ice. Just make sure you add the coffee AFTER blending the other ingredients together. You don't want to cook the egg whites with the hot liquid. Definitely buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Skinner

customer_reviews.title: this egg white protein was the worst thing I have ever tasted
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what other lucky people are talking about here: this egg white protein was the worst thing I have ever tasted. The taste can not be covered with any fruit or almond milk. When I added it to oatmeal, it turned into rubbery textured clumps (which was expected). Was very excited and wanted to give it a chance. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Flexible to meet flavor preferences
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be very good quality. I love the fact that it is not flavored. If you use berries in your smoothie, then the berry flavor is not covered up. I sometimes add a small amount of cacao powder for a chocolate taste. For vanilla I usually mix half of this protein with another protein such as vanilla bone broth, whey or vegetable that are vanilla flavored. I rotate thru the protein and flavor varieties.
customer_reviews.author: Leacato

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Protein
customer_reviews.text: This is high quality egg white protein, unsweetened and unflavored, with just one other ingredient: sunflower lecithin. Sunflower lecithin is much healthier than a cheap soy-based compound called soy lecithin, which you'll see in some other protein powders. Egg white protein is one of the preferred protein powder sources, being gluten-and lactose-free, and low in calories. The protein found in egg whites is a complete protein, meaning it contains all nine essential amino acids in the amounts our bodies need to function optimally. This product was delivered quickly, with just the necessary packaging, and at a competitive price (especially using Amazon's Subscribe and Save).
customer_reviews.author: OnTheEdge

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT TASTE GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many different protein powders over the years. This product stands out as the worst tasting, and poorest mixing product I have ever bought. It is very bad at dissolving and mixing, and has a gritty, sandy mouthfeel. The taste is hard to describe but, suffice it to say, is unpleasant. I used about five scoops of this product and gave up. I then purchased True Nutrition as a replacement and it has been very good.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: Love The Egg Based Protein
customer_reviews.text: I like that this powder is not flavored. I can add fruit or honey suited for my taste. I don't like overly sweet drinks. I'm a runner and cardio and weight training is my daily workout plan to improve my performance. The most important thing is that I'm lactose intolerant and the egg based protein is great for me. The only negative is that the pouch did not come with a scoop. But I have scoops from past powders and use that.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K

customer_reviews.title: Great Whole30 protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I go this because I was doing the whole 30 and wanted to make my morning protein shake but there aren't any approved protein powders on the market. I like this because it's oderless and tasteless but makes my smoothie a bit thicker/frothy and adds lots of protein to it. I also sometimes add a bit to oatmeal (when not doing the whole 30) since there's no taste it's an easy way to make a healthy breakfast option more protein rich!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Fine taste, doesn't dissolve well
customer_reviews.text: I need a dairy free, soy free, unsweetened protein product and this fits the bill! The brand I usually use wasn't available so I thought I would try this. It's a little more expensive, so I purchased a small package. The taste is fine - unflavored so works with anything. However, it doesn't dissolve well. Even when I leave the blender on for longer, I still have small clumps and texture in my drink. I've also tried different ways of adding the powder to reduce lumps. No success. I'll use the package, and will look for another brand when it's time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: Great value protein for smoothies and cooking
customer_reviews.text: These egg whites blended smoothly, and didn't add much of a noticeable flavor to smoothies. It works well blended with soy/milk, stevia, and frozen fruit, cocoa, peanut butter, coffee powder--pretty much anything.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Protein for Days!
customer_reviews.text: I do long distance hiking and my partner is a road cyclist. We have been very grateful for this quality protein, no digestion trouble. I add this to everything, oatmeal, smoothies, and appreciate having a protein hit first thing in the morning or easy digestion after a long walk. Just purchased our second container. We recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Skidtz

customer_reviews.title: Non-GMO Protein
customer_reviews.text: I use it in smoothies and can taste a little of the egg white powder. The extra protein is already making a difference after several months of being protein deprived shall we say. Glad to find Non-GMO. Been using this for over a year. It is economical and does the job. It can be used in soups, breads, and smoothies, no doubt other dishes. Blend with other protein powders for extra high protein.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Ella Howard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is high, just eat whites and soy lechitin (emulsifier). No added sugars, flavors or sweetners. For the 2.2lbs bag you get 40 servings for about $30 which is the best value I can find. Blends well, but it does add some flavor which is hard to describe. Not bad, just not nothing. Wouldn’t drink it by itself
customer_reviews.author: Timmett son of Timmett

customer_reviews.title: No taste and adds protein!
customer_reviews.text: Whole 30 compliant! there is no flavor to this. I don't recommend using this in any type of hot liquid, as it will turn into egg whites (learned from experience... making bullet proof protein coffee and had chunks of egg white). Makes sense though. If youre looking to up your protein intake but don't want the crap that they put in normal protein powder, this works GREAT. We add to our smoothies, using banana and strawberry and you cant even taste it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: USDA organic ?
customer_reviews.text: Contains sunflower lecithin which might not be USDA organic or pesticide free, but it doesn't say, nor does the label indicate the volume of sunflower lecithin. Wish it did. No information as to what the chickens were feed or if they were treated with antibiotics. Would be good to know. The label does say gluten free, which seems silly because the only two ingredients don't have gluten.
customer_reviews.author: justmaybe

customer_reviews.title: Great and Natural - easy to blend
customer_reviews.text: This egg white protein is a great base for adding protein to food with no nasty flavor or texture. I recommend blending a cup of Tazo Iced Passion tea+ 1tsp sugar free vanilla creamer+ cup of frozen fruit (I used raspberries)+ a scoop of egg white protein= AMAZING smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: M.P.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Judee's Egg White Protein powder for a while now (probably at last 4 2.2lbs packages and every one of them has been high quality and consistent. The flavor is very mild - really don't notice it in smoothies or when I mix it in with some yogurt and fruit amongst other uses. I like how it packs a lot of protein punch into a small amount. A 2.2 lb bag goes a long way and especially for the price. I'm a very happy repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Randall J. Pilkenton

customer_reviews.title: Expands too much
customer_reviews.text: Cannot be mixed inside of a Neutra bullet blender. The egg white powder expands dramatically. I had to mix our morning drinks separately. Also, the egg white protein floats to the top and has to be constantly stirred while drinking. The only good thing about that is there is no flavor to this. But I will not buy this product again .
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Judee's egg white protein powder daily for several months. It's a great substitute for those who have a problem with whey protein or others. What particularly appeals to me is that it is flavor-free unlike other proteins, so I can mix it in any beverage and even use it in cooking. I recently ordered a second bag because I like it so much. Here's an update - this product is excellent for any use you may have for eggs. I use it daily in my protein shakes. I'm on my 3rd bag of it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Tastes is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Others have stated that the black packaged protein was good quality, ok smell, and decent taste. The item I received was white packaged, smelled terrible, and tasted horrendous. Even when mixing with almond milk or smoothies it couldn't mask the taste.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Add protein to anything
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my one egg I am making into an omelet so I dont have too much cholesterol -- you can even just use this if you dont want any yolk. This is good in a smoothie, when baking or just add it into when you are cooking to increase the protein for the dish or item you're cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Ideal protein booster
customer_reviews.text: With its neutral flavor, low calorie, no fat, no added sugars, and only 1 g of carbs per serving, this is an ideal way to boost your daily protein intake. I’ve been adding it to my chocolate whey protein powder in my protein shakes for added protein without adding to the other macros.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, wish it was organic & pasture raised
customer_reviews.text: Their egg white protein powder is my favourite of all the ones I’ve tried. The taste is a subtle custardy flavour. I just add almond milk and honey and blend. I took off one point because I would LOVE an egg white protein powder that came from organic, happy, pasture-raised chickens.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION!  Not palatable at all and has strange metallic taste!
customer_reviews.text: This should be zero stars - there needs to be some oversight for this- Something definitely wrong with this product- first time trying product found it has a burnt, metallic taste - and a chemical odor- not at all acceptable tried to return but Amazon does not allow- read label and could not find the “GMP” approval stamp, maybe I should have paid closer attention.
customer_reviews.author: Ragnarok

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good price, mixes great with smoothie. Here's my morning smoothie recipe for you paleo folks. One scoop protein powder One tablespoon raw cacao powder One frozen banana Handful frozen blueberries 2 tablespoons nut butter Almond milk cold coffee concentrate (for extra kick)
customer_reviews.author: YakFisher

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to making Jello with higher protein content
customer_reviews.text: Used this for added protein to Jello desert. Works well. Gives a frothy top to the Jello. Mixes and dissolves well. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great protein power without sugar
customer_reviews.text: So I try to find the most simple, no sugar added, food source protein. And come across this. I like the flavor a lot. I literally just add water and drink. It will create a lot of foam, which is normal. Overall, I like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Will Cao

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great. It dissolves well in water or other liquid
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. It dissolves well in water or other liquid, is near tasteless, not much grit, and is priced right, from the USA and I believe the company is doing the right thing with safety and quality. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Simple way to boost protein in meals.
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use in smoothies and can be added to yogurt, cottage cheese, even omelettes. I haven't gotten too creative with it yet, but I'm guessing there are lots of ways to incorporate it into foods. It doesn't have a distinct flavor or odor, so it is hardly noticeable. If you are looking for a protein boost, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Debra C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Unsweetened protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect for my needs right now. I've had no digestive issues at all. I love that you only need a small amount to get a good amount of protein.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect plain flavored ingredient for you
customer_reviews.text: I made homemade high protein bars. This ingredient was perfect! The neutral flavor let the other ingredients with great flavors be enjoyed. I have tried other types of protein powders with stevia before, but yuck! The aftertaste overwhelmed the protein bar. I’ll only buy this product from now on! Stevia is not needed and I’m very happy it isn’t in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Al A.

customer_reviews.title: The original protein was a black package and it tasted fine. The latest package was white and it tastes ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd time I ordered the product and it has clearly changed. The original protein was a black package and it tasted fine. The latest package was white and it tastes horrible, as though there is something wrong with the protein. I would avoid it.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Ber

customer_reviews.title: purity and quality
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product to replace whey protein products which were causing me digestive distress. I bought the flavorless variety and am very, very pleased with the quality and freshness ensured by the top quality packaging of a solid zip-lock , stand alone package that easily stores. The egg white is a consistent color and texture which blends very easily into food. Being flavorless, you don't need to add sweetener to mask an unpleasant taste as you do with many whey products. Very pleased with this product and plan to continue to use it for protein supplementation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No scent or taste - 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Im somewhat lactose intolerant and whey distoys my stomach, so for the last two years I haven’t used protein poweder. My girlfriend recently suggested egg based poweder. I chose this one based on the price and I love it! Even if you’re not lactose sensitive try this! The fact it is literally flavorless makes it so versatile! Make a shake with ice cream BOOM, make a fruit smooth BOOM, make a PB BOOM & banana shake! The list is endless.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to call, this a powder because it's a bit thicker than that. It is excellent in smoothies and applesauce. I mix it into hot oatmeal too. It has virtually no flavor and is a good source of protein. I'll always buy this powder. It's simply the best.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Eggy taste, but good product!
customer_reviews.text: This powder combines with water or milk easily (I used almond milk) without chunks. The package was intact and in good condition upon arrival. The only thing I would note is that it is unflavored but does have an "eggy" taste. I blended it with frozen fruit and it was not appetizing, I've begun blending this with a half a scoop of vanilla or chocolate flavored whey protein which makes it palatable. Good product overall, just be aware that it does have an odd taste to it.
customer_reviews.author: A. M-Pose

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein for Fruit Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I do not like to drink chocolate or vanilla flavored shakes, and most whey and other proteins taste terrible in any other context. This egg protein does not noticeably alter the taste of fruit and vegetable smoothies, even when you use more of it, and I feel so much better after drinking the more natural shakes I make using this protein.
customer_reviews.author: G$

customer_reviews.title: White packaging bitter flavor ?
customer_reviews.text: I just received my 4th shipment of this product. The packaging is normally black...this one is white. The powder has a very overpowering, bitter taste. Previous orders had no taste at all. The best by date is well into August 2018.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Davis

customer_reviews.title: It blends in easy, and it does not cause bloating at all
customer_reviews.text: It blends in easy, and it does not cause bloating at all. Perfect for any body with dairy food allergy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Harmon

customer_reviews.title: This stuff dissolves instantly and even tastes a lot better (somehow). And
customer_reviews.text: I bought some Now brand egg white powder, but it wouldn't mix well at all unless you used a blender. Huge chucks of chewy powder were left even after stirring for several minutes. This stuff dissolves instantly and even tastes a lot better (somehow). And, it's cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Whey was upsetting my stomach and this was the perfect solution. I'd say it doesn't really have much of a taste, i just mix it with water and add a squirt of lemon Mio and it is like drinking Lemonade. I would definitely recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Motte

customer_reviews.title: What your body needs.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best ways to add highly digestible protein to your diet. I used to believe that raw egg whites were the best. I did my research and found that the method used by this company produces the best egg protein for your body. You can't beat this.
customer_reviews.author: CapeCoral

customer_reviews.title: Tastes horrible
customer_reviews.text: I did subscribe and save for this and got the second delivery before I had tried it. Big mistake. I had been using unflavored whey protein and it doesn't taste great, but it's bearable. This protein is about the worst thing I have ever tasted. It smelled bad and is incredibly bitter. I tried masking the flavor, but I don't think it's possible. Too bad, I had high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: nickfinity

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein powder. Unlike other reviews I did not smell any bad odor. It was fresh and mixes up light and fluffy, which is fun for a change. I mix water, banana and water with a splash of almond milk. Tastes fabulous and is super fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Anastacia Lynn

customer_reviews.title: You might like it,  if you have no taste buds
customer_reviews.text: I can handle many different tastes, but this is awful. I do not know what I'm going to do with the bag now, since no returns. I cannot stomach it when with a mixture. I bought it trying to find a protein that doesn't give me digestive, bloating issues. No Luck, super yucky.
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: A good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I actually mix this 2.2 lb package of egg white protein powder with 2 lbs of an unflavored whey isolate. They both have a super high absorption ratio, but they absorb at different rates of time. I flavor it myself. It's a good clean product that mixes well with water and other powders. I am a return customer.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke Sr

customer_reviews.title: No “eggy” taste
customer_reviews.text: No “eggy” taste and mixes well with smoothie. Wanted protein but not whey protein. Will buy again. Have purchased 3 bags total. My older kids like to add in smoothies, too. Great product for grain free and keto lifestyles.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many different protein powders over the years and egg whites seem to be best for me. And this particular brand is the best that I've tried. Others clump and stick to everything, but this one does not. Others have additional ingredients that I don't necessarily want, and definitely don't want to pay extra for. This one is just egg whites. Also, the bag is perfect, stands up on the counter, is very thick and foil lined, and the zip lock is high quality so it seals well and keeps the powder fresh. I'm very happy with a product that the owners obviously put a lot of care into.
customer_reviews.author: cgmurray

customer_reviews.title: Judees Egg-white Protein salty
customer_reviews.text: I was so shocked when I made my smoothie. This product was so salty I couldn't drink it. If you don't like a lot of sodium beware. Amazon gave me a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Donalie S.

customer_reviews.title: No Weird Taste
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my apple/oatmeal/walnut/almond milk breakfast smoothie. Blends well and has had no detrimental effect on the taste. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it taste great and VERY HEALTHY. It also gives me a lot of energy. Highly recommend it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Alien

customer_reviews.title: Eat Clean recharge your body Athletes
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality, Low Price and A+ Shipping. Highly recommend to all. Using the powder in my Keto bread recipe, worked fantastically! Now using it in smoothy with ghirardelli 100% coco with almond milk wow game changer (clean + lean)
customer_reviews.author: Fest verdrahtet

customer_reviews.title: ... used this to make keto bread and it was fantastic toasted.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make keto bread and it was fantastic toasted.
customer_reviews.author: Forever_21!

customer_reviews.title: I really like that I can pt this in almost anything and ...
customer_reviews.text: No taste to it at all. I really like that I can pt this in almost anything and have my added almost perfect portion source. I will buy this again and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Reinholdt

customer_reviews.title: REALLY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: This eggwhite protein mixes very easily. I'm glad to see that they are using sunflower lecithin instead of soy.
customer_reviews.author: adrian

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It has a salty flavor. Personally, I dislike it. But, it does what it needs to do. Has good protein. And makes good shakes. Cons: Salty, Doesnt mix well
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: No flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I sure didn’t know what to expect but this is perfect in my smoothies. No flavor and lots of protein !
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: My new keto staple.
customer_reviews.text: Happy that I found this. I've made a few recipes with it so far and they've turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cotton

customer_reviews.title: This egg white protein powder fit the bill and does the job nicely. This is our second order of this package ...
customer_reviews.text: About 2 months ago we began Whole30 and following a Paleo lifestyle. We were looking for a protein powder to throw into our smoothies that didn't contain whey or sweeteners. This egg white protein powder fit the bill and does the job nicely. This is our second order of this package and we will continue to order as we use up our supply.
customer_reviews.author: KrazzyKs

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: This item is the best Protein Powder I have tasted and I enjoy it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Zic

customer_reviews.title: No icky taste and digests easily
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this product is very soluble in liquid and it has no taste when mixed in a smoothie with yogurt and/or fruit. The fact that it has no icky additives and contains only egg white protein and sunflower lecithin is a big plus as there are no side effects and digests easily. Also, the price of this product is spot on compared to others who charge twice as much for egg white protein but without the certified organic benefit. Thanks for making this natural product so I can skip a meal and still get my protein when I don't have time to cook. I am a fan and will make this my primary supplier. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great price for 2 lbs
customer_reviews.text: Mixed it with what I had left in a container of another product. This has softer bumps so melts in the mouth. Not sweet so there is no craving. Real good. Will buy again. Great price for 2 lbs. Made in USA
customer_reviews.author: Apollo

customer_reviews.title: My first choice
customer_reviews.text: I will always buy this as my post workout shake. Just compare the ingredient list with and other protien
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Stomach sensitivity is real.
customer_reviews.text: This formula is incredibly unbalancing to my gastric system and ability to stay hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This product is really good, I strongly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I am new to all of this protein in powder form world, l have tried some others that are lactose free because of my intolerance to dairy products. This product is really good, I strongly recommend it, it has no taste which means you can add any flavor you want to your protein shake, l love that it only has 2 ingredients and the price is not bad at all... The only thing l have not seen in the bag yet is the scoop, so you have to get your own because it does not seem to include one. Overall the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Robledo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Mixes well without much clumping and has a pleasant, almost neutral, flavor so I can blend it with other protein powders or add a little chocolate syrup or any other flavor I feel like. A quality product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and mixes well.
customer_reviews.text: I used this in smoothies, coffee and for cooking so far. No sweetener, no taste, just protein. It mixes well and doesn't have an overly egg smell. Add some fruit or mix it with another plant protein powder. Then blend it and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: WEJ

customer_reviews.title: Mixes easily
customer_reviews.text: I mix a couple tablespoons in with my oatmeal in the morning. Mixes easier than the other egg white protein powder I was using (I just use a spoon, not a blender). My wife uses the protein powder in her smoothies. She likes it too. We'll be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: D. Conner

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Tasteless, odorless, blends well and packed with protein. I searched for a few weeks before settling on this item and it was well worth the wait. Based on my experience, I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: K Z

customer_reviews.title: Egg Whites Powder
customer_reviews.text: This is a good egg white protein powder and comes in a good size resealable bag. I’ve had no issues with my baked goods or flavor profiles in using this product. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J.

customer_reviews.title: Good protein powder, mild flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have IBS and malabsorb dairy. This is a protein I can use without issue. Flavor is bland, but very mild so it mixes wellbin a smoothie or shake. I usually just stir it into water. It’s not bad.
customer_reviews.author: John Anders

customer_reviews.title: Perfect protein for smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to add protein to my smoothies. Love it! I was expecting it to smell & to have to cover up the taste but was pleasantly surprised that I haven't had to deal with either. Light powdery consistency & blends well.
customer_reviews.author: UpToParGina

customer_reviews.title: No Hidden Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein powder. I have severe digestive issues and can’t tolerate a lot of protein powders (even if they’re natural), but this product is great and I have zero adverse side-effects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like this egg white protein.
customer_reviews.text: We use this product every day in a smoothie. It blends easily with the fruits and vegetables and does not change the taste. Have tried others but this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: LES

customer_reviews.title: Great protein
customer_reviews.text: I add this protein to my smoothies and I’m very pleased that it has not caused any stomach upset. It’s an easy way to add protein to my diet.
customer_reviews.author: Keith and Penny

customer_reviews.title: Mixes easily
customer_reviews.text: Mixed easily with spoon or whisk in water. Flavor is neutral so adding sweetener or flavoring is easy. Very cost-effective quality protein!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really good product and awesome costumer service. I had a problem with the delivery and they replace it for me. Definitely going to buy again👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: sebee

customer_reviews.title: easily blended
customer_reviews.text: I've used other egg white powders in my protein shakes, but they didn't dissolve as well as this one does. I'll be reordering as soon as I get close to running low.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle528

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Clean, tastes good and overall great product. I use one table spoon of protein a little bit of chlorella and spirulina, a banana with some almond milk and it tastes amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Podolsky

customer_reviews.title: Good Smoothie mix
customer_reviews.text: First let me say I do not like eggs at all. I mix this in with my morning smoothie of wild blueberries, almond milk plus other ingredients and cannot taste it at all. Great alternative to whey or other protein powders.
customer_reviews.author: B Hansen

customer_reviews.title: excellent protein powder
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several manufacturers and this is just as good as the more expensive brands. Works great in your morning smoothie!
customer_reviews.author: AustinHye

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great in smoothies
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great in smoothies. No taste so you can use in veggie smoothies or fruit smoothies. Had such a hard time with other protein powders because of the overpowering flavor. The blender does a great job of mixing it in. I have also added to creamy soups. Just have to mix well or in the blender so no lumps. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a non flavored protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Melr

customer_reviews.title: Great in smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Don't even know it's there. Keeps me full until afternoon
customer_reviews.author: Mark in DC

customer_reviews.title: Has detractors but worth it overall, clean powder.
customer_reviews.text: Taste is bland, does not mix well stays pretty clumped up. Upside is the price was right, & its tiny ingredient list & high potency are worth while. Can add it to about anything you want.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Blends easily in a blender (haven’t tried just stirring in) and has a pleasant taste. No added ingredients, except for a tiny amount of Sunflower Lecithin to prevent clumping.
customer_reviews.author: Bob C

customer_reviews.title: Nice egg protein !
customer_reviews.text: Egg white protein power : I bought to mix with my morning fruit shake and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect substitute for a dairy-free
customer_reviews.text: perfect substitute for a dairy-free, soy-free, gluten-free alternative to protein powders. Not much of a taste, which I enjoy. Use this as a protein powder in shakes and smoothies and LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenai Jasper

customer_reviews.title: More Energy
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Take it when I travel... has totally increased my energy level. It has no taste so I mix it with almond milk bananas and blueberries. Look forward to it every morning 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne H.

customer_reviews.title: Eady to use
customer_reviews.text: As a vegetarian this product is wonderful. Tasteless, dissolves easily and can be mixed into anything.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Alley

customer_reviews.title: Best protein !
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one to write reviews AT ALL but this protein has honestly worked for me over all others (I.e whey, casein, soy, etc.) I don’t get the headaches and stomach aches as I did before with other proteins. Mixes well with morning smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a clean simple protein powder (not whey) that I could add to various foods for a healthy protein boost and this works perfectly. I blend a tablespoon along with pb powder in oatmeal and the results is creamy and delicious. Mixed with vanilla greek yogurt it tastes almost like vanilla cake batter, yum! It also blends well in a typical protein shake because you taste more of the other ingredients rather than the protein. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tatanisha K. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: best for smoothie does not have the after taste or grit of other palo powders
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: I found a new use for this
customer_reviews.text: It makes a great coating for chicken. I season it and coat the chicken before frying or air frying. Makes a great crust.
customer_reviews.author: ROB P

customer_reviews.title: would like to also see an inorganic
customer_reviews.text: I have been using J. Rob protein for years. Now it has xylitol in it, so I looked for one that was all natural, with nothing added. This filled the bill, I will be buying this product, would like to to see an organic option.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

product_meta.title: Egg White Protein Powder (2.2 lbs) Keto, Non GMO, Dairy Free, Soy Free, Dedicated Gluten & Nut Free Facility, Made in USA (4 lb & 44 lb Bulk Size Options Also Available)
feature_bullets: Paleo Egg White Protein Powder with just a tiny bit of Sunflower Lecithin that allows the Egg Whites to dissolve fully in your protein packed smoothies and shakes
Unflavored, Non GMO, Gluten Free, Nut Free, Soy Free, Dairy Free. Made in USA
Instantly mixes in water, 1/4 cup serving has 20g protein and 100 calories. Entire package has 40 servings
Packaged in a Dedicated Gluten & Nut Free Bakery in a foil lined resealable standup pouch to preserve freshness
Some people are sensitive to adding egg protein to their diet. Start with 1/2 serving and work up to 1 serving when beginning to ensure you are not sensitive

specifications.Manufacturer: Gluten Free You and Me LLC
